name: Last flower at rest
description:
LAST FLOWER AT REST

(a platformer without the platforms, a puzzle game without hope)

_________________

_________________

The flower was waiting

Waiting for her friends to return

So she could finally rest

_________________

_________________

CONTROLS

WASD- or ARROW-keys to move

SHIFT to change mode, either MOVE THE PLAYER or MOVE THE PLATFORMS

H for Hint

R for Retry

ESC for new beginning

(f10 - windowed -- f12 - fullscreen)

_________________

Game was made within 24 hours as a solo-project
